title: SDS schema for the IPI survey

survey_id.description: The identifier for a particular survey

identifier.description: The unique top-level identifier. This is the reporting unit reference without the check letter appended.

supplier_number.description: Like ruref, this is also a unique top-level identifier fo the business. The Supplier ID is essentially the RU number but the first digit is changed for  IPI. If the first digit of an RU number is a 4 is the supplier ID is changed to a 2 and if the first digit of the RU is a 5 the supplier ID is changed to a 3.

current_month.description: The month and year that the data is required for.

propertyNames.description: Names for repeating items must be lower case, start with a letter or number, end with a letter or number, and contain only letters, numbers, or hyphens. This field can be shown in eQ URLs therefore no other characters are allowed.

identifier.description: The 10 digit unique reference for each item produced by the business. This number is allocated by ONS, if the item was to change the number would stay the same.

item_number.description: The 10 digit unique reference for each item produced by the business. This number is allocated by ONS, if the item was to change the number would stay the same.

item_specification_1.description: A separate field of the specification for the item produced by the business, the contents and order of this field can change dependent on the number of characters. This line is always PRODUCT.
